abstracts.cdata!:
The development objectives of the Second
            Phase of the Basic Education Project for Uzbekistan is to
            continue supporting Government of Uzbekistan's
            (GoU's) efforts to improve effectiveness of teaching
            and learning through: (1) targeted interventions in selected
            general secondary education schools and preschools in rural
            poor areas; (2) development of institutional capacity to
            assess student learning; and (3) adoption of predictable and
            transparent school budgets in selected oblasts. Under this
            restructuring, the government has requested that the Bank
            cancel United States (U.S.) 2.5 million dollars equivalent
            (special drawing rights (SDR) 1,615,613.29) of the original
            credit since the project is due to close by March 31, 2014
            and this financing is no longer needed for project activities.
